entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:18 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 1:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
